input.sentences: over the weekend my husband participated in a huge motorcycle race .
all the racers were ready to go when they got started .
my friends decided to wear jackets to support their husbands .
one of the woman was not exactly dressed for a bike race .
i however was wearing my boots to the race .
output.sentences: A man was feeling pretty bumbed about missing the bike race.
The man went to the store to get himself some botles of water for a short trip.
He went to the park and decided to wrtie a quick song.
The man finally got the melody right and started playing.
The man decided to go to the cemetary to play his new tune for his grandpa.
